module.name: tablerateshipping
module.displayName: Table Rate Shipping - PrestaShop Shipping by Zip Code Module - Kahanit
module.description: Setup shipping charges based on zone, country, state/region, city, zip/post code, total weight, total price, total pretax price, total quantity and total volume.
module.author: Kahanit
module.confirmUninstall: Uninstalling the module will delete all data?
